title: Deixa Que Te Leve
overview: Maria Della Luce TÃ¡vora Gonzaga Valenti, Duchess of Orvieto, fed up with being chased by the paparazzi, leaves Italy, where she lived with part of her family. Portugal, more specifically Arcos de Valdevez and Peneda, are the refuge chosen by the young woman, who will go by the name of Luz.
